amendment.description: To repeal certain tax benefits relating to oil and gas wells intangible drilling and development costs.

action.text: Amendment SA 2609 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2609.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2609 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 332.
Amendment SA 2609 ruled out of order by the chair.
